about_the_game:
What Is It ?

Story heavy turnbased combat Pixel/3d RPG with a story arc that stretches far beyond what you may expect.
Plot twists , curve balls, profanity, mature story and sometimes unfair (i'm sorry) you will either love or hate the characters in Seed of God but always have a desire to push on and experience the events in Avelon and the kingdom of Riebenhelm in this epic saga.

What is in the demo ?

This is a micro demo and only serves to give you an idea of the atmosphere in Seed of God .
If you have performance issues go to windowed mode (Alt+Enter) and change texture size to half that will mostly fix the issue.

Avelon

A distant world surrounded by a endless ocean and shrouded in mist, protected by God and the Pillar of light Avelons inhabitants pray everyday to keep it so.
It's with fear everyone remember what happend a millennia ago .

Good or Bad ?

You will constantly be faced with morale dilemmas or choices that define who you are or how events unfold and can even affect relationship with characters in Kingdom of Riebenhelm.
But caution ! you often only have one chance to make a decision since save scumming is made limited.
Also, you may or may not know beforehand how your choices will affect the gameplay so be prepared to live with the consequence of your choice.

Turnbased Combat

With several partymembers you combat both random encounters and visible threats using weapons , skills , items and magic and your partymembers
brings their own unique weapons and skills to aid you in battle.
gain experience points to level up your stats and beat even greaters foes

Influences

Developer grew up in the golden era of JRPG and Finalfantasy 7 & 9 influenced greatly how character arcs and story is told in Seed of God.
It also has a very unique soundtrack that will make you stop and listen more then once .

Main Story

Story is aimed at a mature audience so expect the unexpected at any given time as you travel.
It will take you through several towns and uniqe locations throughout your adventure and
characters you meet will be given plenty of space to tell their own story.



If you want to support , be part of the game or or give the alone developer some motivation please visit the games discord .
